abstract.original_text: : The effect of quinolone anti-malarials on sensitivities of cells treated with anthrax toxins. RAW264.7 cells were pretreated with indicated drugs at shown concentrations for 1 hour, and then treated with anthrax toxins for 6 hours. RAW264.7 survival was measured by MTT assay.

RAW264 .7 cells were pretreated with indicated drugs at shown concentrations for 1 hour ,
and then treated with anthrax toxins for 6 hours .
